channel.title: [562]Project-Pks 562 Development Team[562]
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Impact][SIZE=5][IMG]http://i61.servimg.com/u/f61/15/11/39/14/projec14.gif[/img] This Source Is Pkzevolutionscape 562[/SIZE][/FONT] [COLOR=DarkGreen][SIZE=4][FONT=Arial Black]I am still coding it but i could use some help [SIZE=5][COLOR=Lime][FONT=Fixedsys][COLOR=DarkRed]Staff Spots Available [COLOR=YellowGreen]Coders:Me,Open,Open [COLOR=DarkOrange]Hoster:Open Backup Hoster:Open [COLOR=Magenta]Forum Manager:Open [COLOR=MediumTurquoise]BETA TESTERS:Open,Open,Open,Open,Open,Open [COLOR=Blue]24/7 Players:Open,Open,Open [/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR]Some things to Add[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [LEFT] [LEFT][COLOR=Red][SIZE=4][FONT=Impact]Working on Mobilising Armies Clothing[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/LEFT] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=4][FONT=Impact][COLOR=Blue]Going to Add Barrows Minigame(With npcs drop barrows armour)[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=4][FONT=Impact][COLOR=Blue][COLOR=DarkOrchid]Going to Add Pest Control Minigame(With npcs drop void)[/COLOR][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=4][FONT=Impact][COLOR=Blue][COLOR=DarkOrchid][COLOR=Orange]Make Barrows armour and Void armour unspawnable(Barrows armour dropped according to which boss)[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=4][FONT=Impact][COLOR=Blue][COLOR=DarkOrchid][COLOR=Orange][COLOR=Cyan]Make a thieving stall at home so people can get money[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=4][FONT=Impact][COLOR=Blue][COLOR=DarkOrchid][COLOR=Orange][COLOR=Cyan][COLOR=Pink]Try to add a new home and other new places[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [CENTER]
Pictures [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/SoulWarsCapes.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Agile.jpg[/img] To change your hair... command ::hair 1-999 (Dont know how many there are) [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/HAIR.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Summon.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Theive.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Agility.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Lobby.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Red.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/RedBoss.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/Blue.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1008.photobucket.com/albums/af205/Gonthorian/BlueBoss.jpg[/img] [/SIZE][/FONT][SIZE=6][FONT=System][COLOR=Red]If any one would like to help me just fill this out and hopefully get accepted [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][QUOTE][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Name Team Spot MSN Reason of Helping[/SIZE][/FONT][/QUOTE][SIZE=6][FONT=System][COLOR=Red] [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER] [/LEFT] [/CENTER]

item.title: [562]Project-Pks 562 Development Team[562]
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

I can be Beta-Tester, and 24/7 player. But I’ll idle for most of the time, whilst skilling… So what do you think?

  • I’ve had experience in the past with Moderator, Administrator. I’ve been a Moderator + Administrator on a lot of servers.
  • I’m coding my own 317 server, if that helps you. I can also get someone to design/make you a forum.

Read full topic
